Liono races into the base and enters the War Room"maximize."  Liono Sits down 
at the head of the table. "For Right now the peoples group is welcome here. 
This new Threat is nor friend or Foe at the moment we all need to be prepared 
of they turn hostile." Liono looks at Plissanta "I'm not one to Bullshit I 
don't like you and you don't like me but right now we are both stuck on the 
defense and you can't win a game if you don't score points." Looks at the all 
the Maximals in the room "So I suggest we work together and defeat our 
opponents for the safety of all."  Liono stands "Each of us have special that 
can make us the strongest Force on earth. So I say we get our gear Travel to 
the newcomers base and kick there ass so hard the next threat going to feel 
it and thank twice."Liono starts pulling up stats on the Holoprojector 
"Because we are the maximals and Nothing going to stand in our way! Who's 
coming with me.
